text: â€œallahvitam itaivitak kettatoru tantanai ataintavarkalai nan unkalukku arivikkava?'' (Enru napiye! Nir avarkalitam kettu) allah evarkalaic capittu, avarkal mitu kopamkontu, avarkalil cilaraik kurankukalakavum panrikalakavum akkinano avarkalum; evarkal saittanai vanankinarkalo avarkalumtan mikat talnta rakattinar. Nerana valiyiliruntu murrilum vali tavariyavarkal'' enru nir kuruviraka
